name: Goblin Daily Life
description:
Many people really think that goblins are small nasty green creatures that are screwing whatever people make. But did you ever want to see, what are they really doing? This game will answer your questions.

Goblin Daily Life - 3D walking game with elements of time management and survival. You have to perform the routine work of a usual goblin, whose duties include maintaining order in the forest. Have time to feed the animals, harvest, heat the house and many others tasks.

Game features:
- Increasing difficulty
- Real time decision making
- Suitable for people of all ages
